      • pvToCurve

        protected double pvToCurve(ReferenceCurveSnapshot curve,
               int periods,
               double dm,
               int daysUntilNextPayment)
        Discounts cash flows by computing z-spread to specified reference curve (implicitly assuming that reference curve represent zero- coupon yields to each curve point). Assumes that period zero represents start of accrual period in which settement date falls (so days[0] either precedes or equals the settlement date).
        Parameters:
        curve -
        periods -
        Returns:
        present value

      • projectFutureCashflows

        public int projectFutureCashflows(double coupon,
                         int paymentFreqMonths,
                         double payoff)
        Populate cashflow buffer with projected cash flows. WARNING: Relies on prior setting of settle and maturity dates. WARNING. Does not clear cashflow buffer. May leave artifacts in cashflow buffer at indices beyond return value.
        Parameters:
        settlement -
        maturity -
        coupon -
        paymentFreqMonths -
        payoff -
        Returns:
        number of future periods (or zero if no future periods remain).

      • projectFutureCashFlowsAndDayCounts

        public int projectFutureCashFlowsAndDayCounts(double currentCoupon,
                                     double forwardCoupon,
                                     int paymentFreqMonths,
                                     DayCountConvention dcAccrual,
                                     double payoff)
                                       throws ValidationException
        Projects cash flows from start of current accrual period (the first day of which should precede or equal the settlement date); ignores whether payment dates are business days. WARNING: Relies on prior setting of settle, maturity and nextpay dates. WARNING. Does not clear cashflow buffer. May leave artifacts in cashflow buffer at indices beyond return value.
        Throws:
        ValidationException

      • projectFutureCashFlowsMmkt

        public int projectFutureCashFlowsMmkt(double currentCoupon,
                             double forwardCoupon,
                             int paymentFreqMonths,
                             int issuedDate,
                             double payoff,
                             DayCountConvention daycount)
                               throws ValidationException
        Sets up money market cash flows and related day counts; settlement occurs during first projection period. Depends on prior setting of maturity (see setMaturityDate(int)). Depends on prior setting of settlement date (see setSettlementDate(int)). Depends on prior setting of interest accrual start date. days[i] represents days from or until settlement date for start of accrual period. cashflows[i] represents cash flow payable at end of accrual period.
        Parameters:
        currentCoupon -
        forwardCoupon -
        paymentFreqMonths -
        payoff -
        daycount -
        Returns:
        Throws:
        ValidationException

        Projects amortizing mortgage cashflows at a specified constant prepayment rate (CPR).
        Parameters:
        couponFixed -
        term -
        wam -
        cprRate -
        Returns:
        last period for which cashflows exist
